headline: Solera Announces Partnership with PPG, a Leading Global Supplier of Paints, Coatings and Specialty Products
summary: Solera and PPG collaborate to enhance CO₂ emissions tracking accuracy per vehicle repairWESTLAKE, Texas, Oct. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Solera, the global leader in vehicle lifecycle management, today announced a strategic partnership with PPG (NYSE:PPG), a global leader in paints, coatings and specialty products. Through this collaboration, PPG’s premium automotive refinish coatings, including NEXA AUTOCOLOR® products and MAXMEYER® coatings, will be integrated into Solera’s Sustainable Estim
